ComicInfo.Summary:
A Killer Cold and Clammy: Zakir has himself turned in to a snake to assassinate Rajah Bahadur.
The Mind That Could Murder: A magician uses his telekinetic powers to take revenge on the Judge that sentenced his son to prison.
The Hideous Trogs: Armand hates the ape-people that live in the mountains above his village.
Fright at the End of the Tunnel: Two convicts attempt to dig their way out of prison.
Final Entry: Nigel wants to leave the rubber plantation.
The Face of Abel: Abel asks the artist Ric Estrada to draw a new portrait of himself.
Female of the Species: A serial killer is stopped by the ghost of another serial killer.
Freak of Nature: Seeking revenge on his partner, Porter summons a demon who gives him the power to take over his rival's life.
Wheel of Fortune: Madame Xanadu helps Joyce stop a cult that is using a disco to sacrifice young ladies to demons.
ComicInfo.Tags: Greenwich Village,The House of Secrets,India,Abel,Madame Xanadu,France
